QuestData.Title: The Best Kill is Overkill
QuestData.Description:
I watched you kill those Sandfury earlier, $p. You have blood instinct. I like dat.
I bet de others have you hunting frivolous luxuries for de inn. I'll give you an assignment worth your talents.
Dis oasis is full of dangerous beasts dat'll scare away guests and harrass my pterrordaxes flying in and out.
Kill dem.
Once de skies are clear, my pterrordaxes can fly you wherever you want.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa predators in the Whistlebloom Oasis.
